text: Ke kaloku (ukuba wawukhona, ubukele), wawungabona xa ilanga liphuma emqolombeni wabo ngasekunene, lize litshone, ligqitha kubo ngasekhohlo, lo gama bona babelele kwindawo ephangaleleyo. Lowo ngomnye wemiqondiso ka-Allâh. Lowo ukhokelwe nguAllâh ukhokeleke ngokulungileyo. Kodwa lowo amyekele ekulahlekeni, lowo akuyi kumfumanela mkhokeli wokumkhokelela (eNdleleni ethe Tye)
